Package entities.paths

Class DP_Decision

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.paths.DP_Decision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<DP_Decision>
    public class DP_Decision
extends Object
implements Comparable<DP_Decision>
    A DP decision that corresponds to an edge in the multi-stage graph. The source is not specified so that the object may be shared by multiple sources.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      double cost
      The cost incurred immediately by this decision.
      DP_DecisionSet decision_set
      The set of decisions that this decision belongs to.
      ArrayList<DP_Decision> successors
      The successors are decisions in the same stage and from the same parent.
      DP_State_Node target
      The state we end up in by following this decision.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DP_Decision​(DP_State_Node resulting_state, double immediate_cost, DP_DecisionSet decision_set)
      Instantiates a new decision with a given cost.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DP_DecisionSet belongs_to()  
      int compareTo​(DP_Decision other)
      Two decisions from the same parent state are compared according to the minimum achievable cost starting from the parent and (as a first step) taking each decision.
      double get_opt_cost()  
      String toString()
      Mainly for debugging.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • cost

        public double cost
        The cost incurred immediately by this decision.

      • target

        public DP_State_Node target
        The state we end up in by following this decision.

      • decision_set

        public DP_DecisionSet decision_set
        The set of decisions that this decision belongs to.

      • successors

        public ArrayList<DP_Decision> successors
        The successors are decisions in the same stage and from the same parent. They are given by a partial order which specifies which decisions we have to consider for getting the next best solution. Used by DP_Part.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DP_Decision

        public DP_Decision​(DP_State_Node resulting_state,
                   double immediate_cost,
                   DP_DecisionSet decision_set)
        Instantiates a new decision with a given cost. We only know the resulting state of a decision (and not its origin) because it may be shared by multiple parents.
        See Also:
        DP_State_Node.share_decisions(entities.paths.DP_State_Node)

    • Method Detail

      • get_opt_cost

        public double get_opt_cost()
        Returns:
        double The minimum achievable cost if we take this decision.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(DP_Decision other)
        Two decisions from the same parent state are compared according to the minimum achievable cost starting from the parent and (as a first step) taking each decision.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<DP_Decision>
        Parameters:

        int
